Description: Bring back the old town of salem UI for Jailor, Pirate, Necromancer, Admirer and Mayor

CheckboxSettings.Name: Safe Mode
CheckboxSettings.Description: Still keeps the default buttons available, in case something goes wrong with the mod. This is the recommended setting.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Icon Recolors Compatibility
CheckboxSettings.Description: Lets icon recolors change custom UI. Set to false if seeing white squares

CheckboxSettings.Name: Old Player List
CheckboxSettings.Description: Makes player positions be fixed when on the show living tab
